goal: Create PythonValidator with Python-specific AST logic from manifest_validator.py
description: Extracts all private Python AST parsing logic from manifest_validator.py into PythonValidator class. This includes _ArtifactCollector (renamed to _PythonArtifactCollector), type string helpers, and all Python-specific validation functions. The public API in manifest_validator.py remains unchanged - it delegates to PythonValidator internally. This enables multi-language support while maintaining backward compatibility.
